sourcesContent:
<template>
  <e-charts class="chart" :option="option" />
</template>
<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      option: {      
        xAxis: {
          type: 'category',
          data: ['Mon', 'Tue', 'Wed', 'Thu', 'Fri', 'Sat', 'Sun']
        },
        yAxis: {
          type: 'value'
        },
        series: [
          {
            data: [150, 230, 224, 218, 135, 147, 260],
            type: 'line'
          }
        ],
      },
    };
  },
  methods: {
    drawLine() {
      let myChart = this.$echarts.init(document.getElementById("myChart"));
      myChart.setOption(this.option);
    },
  },
  mounted() {
    this.drawLine();
  },
};
</script>
